title: [Large-scale] Scaffolding-based English Grammar E-Assessment Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational English grammar and understanding of pedagogy
context.additional_context: A program for prospective and in-service science teachers to strengthen their competencies in teaching English grammar.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze complex English grammatical structures with 80% accuracy using a scaffolding hint system.
Learners enhance their self-diagnostic skills by correcting grammatical errors within two attempts via a real-time feedback mechanism.
Learners can independently select and apply learning strategies tailored to their cognitive style (Holistic/Serialist).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
